TextView.android:text: A Rock Paper Scissors training app

Rock Doctor aims to improve your Rock Paper Scissors skills by trying to guess your moves.

You may think you are acting randomly but almost surely aren't. You can use Rock Doctor to find your most common mistakes.

Rock Doctor remembers your actions using several internal models. It uses these models to predict your behaviour.

These models include a bank of two-stage branch predictors, a meta-model, a purely random model, and a frequency analysis model.

To adapt to changes to your strategy in real time, Rock Doctor uses a Bayesian model selection process.

In this way, Rock Doctor aims to always give you a challenging opponent who NEVER gives up.
